UMTHOMBO WEENDABA Isebe Lezempilo (uRhulumente Wephondo leNtshona Kapa)

ISebe lezeMpilo eNtshona Koloni lidibene ne-Crusaid, umbutho owasekwa kwelase-UK ojongene neHIV /Aids, liza kumisela iZiko elitsha elizinikeleyo lokuqala lezoNyango nge-Anti-Retroviral, ziko elo liphaya eGugulethu, oko kuya kwenzeka ngoLwesine umhla we-3 kuMatshi 2005. IZiko, 'iHannan Crusaid ARV Treatment Centre' limi njengendawo yokulinga unyango nge-anti-retroviral (ARV) eMzantsi Afrika.

Ekupheleni kukaJanuwari 2005, iSebe lezeMpilo lePhondo leNtshona Koloni linezigulane ezingama-6 660 ezifumana unyango nge-anti-retroviral kwiindawo ezingama-31 kwiphondo liphela, nani elo ligqithileyo kwinto ebekujoliswe kuyo kulo nyaka-mali.

Inkqubo ye-anti-retroviral treatment (ARV) iphakamisa ukuba inkqubo esetyenziswayo ibe yinkqubo esekelezwe ekhaya elusatsheni ukulungiselela unyango nge-anti-retroviral eluntwini, oko kusenziwa ngokwakhela phezu kothungelwano lokuqwalaselwa kwe-HIV osele luqhutywa. Le nkqubo ikhangela abantu abosuleleke yi-HIV ukuze ibe ngabo abafumana olu nyango kananjalo kulandelelelwe abalingani babo, ngolo hlobo ke unyango lwe-ARV olunikwayo luqhube ixesha elide.

Injongo yale nkqubo kukunika unyango kubantu abasuleleke yintsholongwane kaGawulayo kwanamabinqa akhulelweyo agqithiselwe kwiikliniki ezirhangqileyo kunye ne-Yunithi yokuBelekisa- Midwife Obstetric Unit (MOU) eGugulethu. Eli ziko limi embindini wale ndawo liya kusebenza njengeziko lezonyango kwaneziko loqeqesho.

lIziko, iHannan Crusaid ARV Treatment Center limele yonke inkqubo eqaliswayo ye-ARV eNtshona Koloni, utsho uPierre Uys, uMphathiswa wezeMpilo weNtshona Koloni.
